## Loading the data

```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
new_candidates <- candidates %>%
  select(cand_name,cand_id,)
```

```{r}
new_contributions <- contributions %>%
  select(cmte_id, city, name, state,transaction_amt,cand_id)
```

```{r}
rm(state_table)
```

```{r}
state_table <- new_candidates %>%
  inner_join(new_contributions, by = c("cand_id" = "cand_id")) 
```
